mapper.select: -- SELECT * FROM op_video order by weight limit 100--> SELECT o.videoId,o.userId,o.videoUrl,o.videoCount,o.weight,o.videoStatus,o.videoTime,o.videoDescript,o.oosId, u.username,u.userId,u.head FROM op_video o ,op_user u WHERE u.userId=o.userId ORDER BY o.weight LIMIT 100

-- SELECT * FROM op_video order by videoCount limit 100--> SELECT o.videoId,o.userId,o.videoUrl,o.videoCount,o.weight,o.videoStatus,o.videoTime,o.videoDescript,o.oosId, u.username,u.userId,u.head FROM op_video o ,op_user u WHERE u.userId=o.userId ORDER BY o.videoCount LIMIT 100

SELECT o.videoId,o.userId,o.videoUrl,o.videoCount,o.weight,o.videoStatus,o.videoTime,o.videoDescript,o.oosId, u.username,u.userId,u.head FROM op_video o,op_attention a,op_user u WHERE a.attentionUid=2 AND o.userid=a.beAttentionUid AND u.userId=o.userId
